section.title: Velkomen
section.p: The Norwegian Sámi Parliament started a project to make sámi proofing tools in october 2004. The proofing tools will be freely available, at no cost, for Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X and Linux.

The proofing project will work tightly together with the Sámi language technology project at the University of Tromsø. Under the Tech. Doc tab you will find the technical documentation our two projects have in common. If you would like to help us you are strongly adviced to read this documentation.
